food.question: I am long and yellow, and monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 📏 I grow on trees.
💛 My color is like the sun.
🍌 Monkeys eat me!

food.question: I am red and round, and I grow on trees. Sometimes I'm used to make juice. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I hang from branches.
🔴 Snow White loved me!
🥤 You can drink me, squeezed.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow in the ground.
🐰 Bugs Bunny's favorite snack!
🔶 I am the color of pumpkins.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with cookies. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 Baby cows drink me.
🐄 I come from an animal.
🍪 I taste good with chocolate chip cookies.

food.question: I am a small, round, green vegetable. I grow in pods and you eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow in a garden.
🟢 I am often found with carrots.
🫛 I live in a pod.

food.question: I am sweet and cold. You eat me with a spoon on a hot day. What am I?

hints.text: 🍧 I can be many different flavors.
🥶 You keep me in the freezer.
🥄 I'm often served in a cone.

food.question: I am made of bread, cheese, and tomato sauce. You bake me in the oven and eat me in slices. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 People in Italy love me!
🍕 I am often cut into triangles.
🔥 You cook me in a hot oven.

food.question: I am a fruit that is purple or green and grows in bunches on a vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 Monkeys and people both eat me!
🍷 Some people make me into juice or wine.
🌿 I grow on long, twisty vines.

food.question: I am yellow on the outside and orange on the inside. You have to roast me before you eat me. Birds like to eat the seeds after you are done. What am I?

hints.text: 🚜 I grow in the fall
🎃 Some people carve faces in me.
🥧 You can make a pie out of me!

food.question: I am a green vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am good for you and your body!
🥗 You can find me in salads!
🌳 I look like a small tree.

animal.question: I quack and swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am often yellow when I'm little.
🦢 I am a type of bird.
🗣️ I say 'quack, quack!'

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈‍⬛ I have soft fur.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🐾 I have four legs and fur.
🏡 I can be a good friend to a human.

animal.question: I hop around and eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I like to munch on orange vegetables.
🐇 I have long ears.
🌱 I live in a burrow.

animal.question: I moo and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I am often black and white.
🌱 I like to eat grass.
🥛 You can drink what I make.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane around my head.
🐾 I am a large cat.
👑 I am known for being strong.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very big and gray.
🚿 I can use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I am tall and have a very long neck. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have spots all over.
🌿 I like to eat leaves from tall trees.
🌳 I am the tallest mammal.

animal.question: I slither and have no legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I shed my skin.
🐾 I have scales.
👅 I flick my tongue to smell.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love to eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am a type of primate.
🌳 I live in the jungle.
🍌 I peel my food before eating it.
